text:
Forge.AI | Cambridge, MA | Full-time | Onsite

Forge is solving one of hardest challenges in AI - how to capture and transform the world’s unstructured information into codified, machine event streams that are specifically designed for use and consumption by a company’s modeling, decision-making, and AI infrastructure.

-Knowledge base engineer: http://www.forge.ai/knowledge-base-development-engineer

-Human language technologies engineer: http://www.forge.ai/hlt-research-engineer

-Data Scientist/Machine learning engineer: http://www.forge.ai/machine-learning-engineer
